definition: grass mud horse/used as a substitute for 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1], to mock or avoid censorship on the Internet
variant of 草[cao3]
grass/straw/manuscript/draft (of a document)/careless/rough/CL:棵[ke1],撮[zuo3],株[zhu1],根[gen1]
variant of 肏[cao4]
mud/clay/paste/pulp
restrained
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: I think only the grass mud horse will be popular for a longer time.
sentences.chinese: 我认为草泥马将会流行很长的时间。

sentences.english: As depicted online, the grass-mud horse seems innocent enough at the start.
sentences.chinese: 最初在网上的描述中，“草泥马”似乎足够清白。

sentences.english: This piece grass mud horse's eye god, worry lush's make man egg pain.
sentences.chinese: 这朵草泥马的眼神，忧郁的让人蛋疼。

sentences.english: Fuck this hollow patriotism and nationalism shit.
sentences.chinese: 草泥马空洞的爱国主义和民族主义垃圾。

sentences.english: Grass Mud Horse is a rare animal and the most famous of the Ten Legendary Beasts of Baidu.
sentences.chinese: 草泥马是一种稀有动物，并被百度评为十大神兽之一。

definition: alpaca
(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF

euphemistic equivalent of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
labor and capital/labor and management
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
variant of 傻屄[sha3 bi1]
(slang) shoot!/crap!
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
see 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1]
(dialect) Beat it!/Scram!/Fuck off!
(slang) fool/dunce/foolishly cute person
(substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
chicken jelly/(Internet slang) exciting (pun on 激動|激动[ji1 dong4])
(vulgar) your mom's a prostitute (from Sichuan pronunciation of 媽賣屄|妈卖屄[ma1 mai4 bi1])
to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
